Notes.Text:
This update for emacs fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-1244: improper handling of custom 'man' URI schemes allow for shell command injections. (bsc#1237091)

Vulnerabilities.Description: A command injection flaw was found in the text editor Emacs. It could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary shell commands on a vulnerable system. Exploitation is possible by tricking users into visiting a specially crafted website or an HTTP URL with a redirect.
